title: Crime Alert 12.07.18
itunes:title: Crime Alert 12.07.18
description:
U.S. tourist found stabbed to death in Costa Rica. Florida dad allegedly throws his 5-year-old daughter off a bridge after hearing voices. Washington DC, experts expect new revelations after Special Counsel Mueller recommends little to no jail time for Michael Flynn.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
